feed.title: Karthikeyan A K‚Äôs blog
feed.subtitle: Hello World, I am Karthikeyan. I eat briyani and worship Boomthata, the creator of God and Satan.

entry.title: Dall-E generated mascot
entry.content:
Dall-E generated pig mascot.

Designers do cost, sometimes even more than developers. Designing is a very creative process. Certainly web pages designed by me sucks, compared to one done by designer. Sometimes I need to shell out a lot if I am doing my personal open source project.

I wanted to write a Personal Micro Blog application to learn Clojure which I named as pig. I have generated a codeberg project here. I wanted a cute baby pig as mascot. I asked designer and he gave me his budget, it was big. I used Dall-E to generate the mascot. I used an A.I tool to upscale the image, and I used A.I to remove background.

I gave the cute pig mascot to my designer to make it into a sticker which you can see in this blog above. I think I reduced designing cost by 70% this time, and I am very happy.

entry.title: Dogs, bloody dogs
entry.content:
Today I see a guy opposite to my home across the water logged empty ground feeding stray dogs. Frankly I would be very happy if he sees his children die before him and he one day vomits blood and die. He must be dead on the road, the same hungry dogs he fed must feast on his meat.

Monday gone, I had to concentrate on work, but from morning 4AM, a stray dog was barking right outside my home at the top of its voice, I couldn‚Äôt sleep. Thankfully my client is very liberal, so I tried to have breakfast, did some minor work, had some lunch and tried to catch sleep, then my neighbor‚Äôs dogs started to bark. I cursed my neighbor‚Äôs too.

The bloody stray dog disturbed my sleep again on Monday night and even on Tuesday I was unable to do the work. I don‚Äôt know where I missed out due to lack of concentration, but I was thinking Thursday wad Wednesday and I missed out on a meeting. I felt so bad.

I am not against dogs, have them, feed them. But if they drop shit on road pick it up and take it home. Such an eyesore and disease spreading they are. You have to watch the dog shit or concentrate on traffic or pedestrian‚Äôs while traveling? Dog owners and lovers please answer this.

If you love dogs, have them in a sound-proof room where they can bark all the hell out, if you want to be in that room so that you can listen to the music you love that‚Äôs made by your dog, none objects, but letting it disturb your neighbor‚Äôs is barbaric and uncultured.

Do not take dogs walks outside because it has no toilet sense, it shits out, and you won‚Äôt pick that treasure of yours up and take it to your home and lick it, instead you will leave it there. Your dog will urinate on lampposts and dustbins, and you won‚Äôt wash it.

Being such irresponsible human who just cares about you and your dog, what‚Äôs the use of your existence? Why you must have family and kids? If you have why should your kids survive with such a genetic defect you have? Why you shouldn‚Äôt watch your kids die thus feel bit better that the Earth is bit more purified? Why those indiscipline dogs you fed, feed on your carcass when you drop dead vomiting blood on street? Maybe some of those dogs might even urinate on your dead body proving their loyalty to you.

entry.title: Need for Tamil Professional Examination
entry.content:
Yesterday I went to hotel named Balaji Bhavan in Sithalapakkam, none except two were there in the hotel (excluding two customers who were sitting like zombies), some lady was doing some work and at the counter there was this guy. I asked for a kothu parotta parcel and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù, the way he said it confirmed he was from north India. I wanted to ask what‚Äôs there in their hotel‚Äôs menu, so I asked it, and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù. I asked him what all items / dishes he had, he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù.

I got fed up and started walking out of the hotel and said cancel it, he said ‚Äúkothu parotta ready‚Äù, I walked out any way wondering how kothu parotta could be ready within two minutes. It‚Äôs annoying with these people now days, though I know Hindi, I am a Tamil and my Hindi did not kick in, these northern people have an illusion that everywhere in India Hindi is spoken, they come here uneducated and irritate us. It‚Äôs great that Tamilnadu is providing work for these people and is contributing to the uplifting of North India, but at the same time our government should ensure these people are educated to serve us.

My plan is this, just like IELTS, we must have Tamil Professional Examination that every worker in Tamilnadu should take. Its syllabus should contain practical Tamil and must train people speak and write fluently. Imagine for example, how good it will be if doctors write medicine names in Tamil and medicine comes with Tamil labels in them? The syllabus should contain basic Tamil grammar and history, so that these workers who should take it by law to work in our land can speak fluently with us and serve us better.

Despite dynastic politics and deep-rooted corruption that erode us, Tamils are hard workers, and we are developing. We are the most urbanized state in India, our economy too is diverse, we have plan to reach 1 trillion $ economy, and it‚Äôs high time we make our work force work smooth with us.
entry.summary: Yesterday I went to hotel named Balaji Bhavan in Sithalapakkam, none except two were there in the hotel (excluding two customers who were sitting like zombies), some lady was doing some work and at the counter there was this guy. I asked for a kothu parotta parcel and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù, the way he said it confirmed he was from north India. I wanted to ask what‚Äôs there in their hotel‚Äôs menu, so I asked it, and he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù. I asked him what all items / dishes he had, he said ‚Äúkothu parotta‚Äù.

entry.title: Does Coimbatore contain high number of psychopaths?

link.title: Does Coimbatore contain high number of psychopaths?

entry.content:
I was taking a walk today when I remembered this phone conversation in which a Coimbatore guy was saying something like this:

‚ÄúMy wife and her father had to take medicine to keep them mentally stable, this illness comes with high intelligence.‚Äù

Just then I was reminded how my life was tormented by people in Coimbatore belt. It was in a company called Z**ec where I was a project manager, another woman was also a project manager, she was from Coimbatore. She knew nothing about I.T and code, but lusted for power, she was like Nandhini in Ponniyin Selvan, I think life hurts her very much, possibly she did not like her marriage. She was highly sociable person, but she behaved like a psycho. I would give my team member a task, only to see that he had been seduced by her to complete her task. I was shocked and called her, and she threatened me to book me in harassing case. I was shocked a bit, but then I gained all my strength, told her to proceed, and I took it as my personal mission to work against her underground and looks like it paid off.

In that same company there was an old jalra guy to the management who was a true psychopath, who enjoyed putting grief into people, and he was this evil woman‚Äôs partner. This evil woman was from Coimbatore, I do suspect this evil guy was also from Coimbatore, but I am not sure.

In that same company I met a great guy, who workers praised as a great manager, we ended up forming our own company, but guess what, think about one year of operation that guys started to shout at people like a mad dog. He shouted at me too for no reason. None of us could get it, he was from Salem, not Coimbatore. I don‚Äôt know Tamilnadu map, but I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if Salem was near to Coimbatore.

One of my girlfriend‚Äôs was near Coimbatore, and she behaved like she loved me and denied it, I wish she is happy now, but her dad‚Äôs sister was mentally unstable and did commit suicide. She herself did want to commit suicide once, and I have to talk to her for days to bring her out of it. I am happy I did not end up marrying her.

As though I had committed a lot of sin, this second Coimbatore girlfriend loved me and wanted to marry me, but she was too afraid of her family and family pride, she got married to a guy which her family chose, later I heard that she believed if my love was true, she expected me to enter tha marriage hall, stopped that marriage and rescue her, since it did not happen she concluded our love was false ü§¶ü§¶ü§¶ü§¶

Any way at least someone thought I was like this:

But ya, one has to be psychopath equating a tech guy with a rowdy. May be only Coimbatore girls can do that.

A Coimbatore person known to me bought a home in Bangalore, he was close to me and asked me to visit for the house-warming, I refused because in those days getting a railway ticket was not easy, I am unsure what‚Äôs the status these days, I hated bus travel as I got almost no sleep in buses, and Aircraft when booked at last minute will be expensive. Even though I considered him as my brother, he seems to have taken my ‚ÄòNo‚Äô as something big. He knew a senior Coimbatore guy who could pressure me up, so the senior guy called me and told me to attend the function, I still said ‚ÄòNo‚Äô, how can a new call change this universe? The senior guy stated behaving like a mad baby and was behaving in an unbelievable way. That senior guys sister was a mad person, she too committed suicide. I thought this guys was mad and so did not take him seriously, but these people worked to dislodge something‚Äôs in my life & economics which I will never forgive. I wish they rot in hell.

In my software teams, I do find Coimbatore people behaving erratic many times. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my bias, or it‚Äôs the truth. I do know that Coimbatore contains lot‚Äôs of CEO‚Äôs and business leaders. Studies have shown that high percentage of business leaders are psychopaths.

In Tamilnadu we see that in Pollachi and Coimbatore, women are highly disregarded and disrespected. I think those are the rape capitals of our Tamilnadu if not India. Coimbatore is a place where BJP is strong and wins regularly. If you look at Tamilandu governor, H.Raja of BJP, Tamil Isai Sounderajan, Annamali, Modi, what names comes to your mind? Ho many internationally renowned intellectuals you have in Congress, how many are there in BJP?

Have you seen any sane leader ordering to shoot his own people? Or claiming he had no knowledge of massacare that happened in the land he rules, and only through news he knew it? We had a Chief minister from Edapaadi who did it, I think those who protested against Vedanta‚Äôs copper factory were shot. I think Edapaadi is in Pollachi belt. Once again I could be wrong, but I do consider EPS a mild psycho. He might not be as corrupt as the Karunanidhi family, but he might be a psychopath.

I would be very interested if any reader of this blog can come up with data, proving or disproving my hypothesis. I am really lazy to dig in and find out which kind of people are admitted in Mental hospitals and from which region they are from.

For some reason I find people of Madurai highly mentally stable, and they have ability to put long term plans. People who are born and brought up in Chennai are highly professionals. Once again I would like some on to prove it or disprove it with data. Till then this blog is just a rant. Maybe we might find the source of high psychopathic illness, and maybe we can do something to avoid and cure it, thus making Tamilnadu better.

entry.title: Why India must promote lab grown meat

link.title: Why India must promote lab grown meat

entry.content:
Few days ago I read in an article that FDA had approved lab grown meat for human consumption. Soon Americans will be able to eat their food without killing animals. This will start small, but will become the primary source of very cheap non-vegetarian food soon.

Say you want to at goats liver, say that‚Äôs the part that is in demand in your region, for that you must raise an entire goat, to access the liver you must kill it. In western world animals are killed by carbon dioxide poisoning, so they feel like they go to sleep, and they die slowly without them knowing it, but here in India we still kill animals by cutting them up, it causes pain. We as a conscious living thing want to live, but we do evil to animals even though as a human we know they experience pain when they are culled. So ethically we must not kill, but we do it, but today science has given us tool to obtain meat without killing a thing, and we must make full use of it.

All religions that originated in India, Jainism, Buddhism, and Sikhism, advocate not to kill animals, but for nutritional needs we kill them. Even Aryanism which first favored eating of animals like horse and cow, after entering India became a bunch of cults called Hinduism today. Most branch of Hinduism today advocates not to eat meat. Somehow this land passivized avid non-vegetarians.

Unlike Arabia and Europe, where agriculture is not as easy, Indians had mastered taming of water long ago, and we produced surplus of grain, so we were able to be empathetic towards animals and get away by drinking milk. Religions evolved here have always advocated being kind to animals and to see them as our own. Even today in many household‚Äôs rice flour is used for kolams, so that ants could feed off it and be not hungry. So our land due to is nature advocates not to kill animals and be kind to them.

There is an environmental benefit too, say just to get say kidney of goat, you must raise the entire goat by using current practices, this requires lot of energy and time, with selective cloning, we can just grow the kidney of goat in vats with far less energy and time involved. Meat industry is one of the worst polluters and emits a lot of carbon dioxide and methane, this new technique of growing animal parts in vats will make it supremely efficient thus reducing global warming.

Meat that does not grow in animals which gets disease, emotional, tired, and that can grow faster in vats and in much more energy efficient way will cost less. Indians need to eat a lot of meat, we are under nourished, and we have a lot of carbs. An average Indian eats 2.2Kg of meat a year, an average American eats 140Kg of meat a year. An average Indian looks really frail compared to a guy from USA, we need to improve our nutrition. One way to do is to drastically reduce price of meat by artificially producing it.
Bug Kebab in Cambodia.

Eating of insects too is far more efficient and more economical than eating meat. It‚Äôs naturally healthier, I with HRD ministry in India promotes insect diet too, but once again insects are conscious, have emotions, and may not want to die. But I do feel we must promote insect protein for healthier India. All over in eastern Asian countries people eat insects, why not us?

One might say that Muslim community in India might eat only slaughtered meat. Let them continue with slaughter, but 75% percent of India still can enjoy ethical lab grown meat and not have the guilt of enjoying food by causing death and pain. I don‚Äôt think many Islamists in India follow strict Islam. I have seen none pray 5 times a day, my friends drink, some of them abroad eat bread (even bread in west contains lard), pork is a delicacy for them. People will change, imagine a guy watching his neighbors buy meat for ‚Çπ50/- and he need to shell out ‚Çπ400/-, definitely common sense will kick in. So I strongly feel India must promote lab grown ethical meat for all good it has in it.

entry.title: Some strange scam on Linkedin
entry.content:
There seems to be some scam going on Linkedin which targets founders and investors in companies. This group seems to be tempting us with something. I received the above message which are very identical from two linked in accounts, one from Subham Ravindra, and another from a girl called Papiya.

After this happened Papiya‚Äôs account seems to have disappeared. I don‚Äôt respond to these messages anyway. This blog is just to warn my fellow founders.
